japanese: ……えーと、俺はどうすりゃいいんだ？
translation: ...Uhh, what should I do?

japanese:
（ホテルの部屋ってのは、
　つまり寝るための部屋だろ？
　なのに、なんでこんなに広いんだ？）
translation:
(A hotel room is basically a room for sleeping,
 right? Why is it so big?)

japanese:
（これじゃ落ち着かねぇ！
　なにかしてねぇと持て余してる感が凄まじい！
　俺１人ならもっと狭い部屋でいいんだが！？）
translation:
(I can't relax like this! It's too overwhelming!
 I need to do something! 
 A smaller room would have been better since I'm alone!)

japanese:
（デスクと椅子は一応あるし、やっぱ勉強するか？
　勉強に向いてるとは言えない作りだが）
translation:
(There is a desk and a chair, so...should I just study then?
 It's not really made for studying though.)

japanese: （ん？　誰だ？）
translation: (Hm? Who is it?)

japanese: はい――
translation: Yes%p-2;――

japanese: って、い、五月っ？
translation: Woah, I-Itsuki?

japanese: こんばんは。
translation: Good evening.

japanese:
お、おう……。
どうしたんだよ、急に。
translation:
H-hey...
What's going on, all of a sudden?

japanese: あの、お部屋に……お邪魔してもいいですか？
translation: Um, can I...come into your room?

japanese: いや、用ならここで聞く。
translation: We can talk right here.

japanese:
（この時間に部屋の中へ入れるのは、
　さすがにどうかと思うし）
translation:
(I think it might not be a good idea to go 
 into the room at this hour...)

japanese:
いえ、その、特に用はないのです。
ただ上杉君とお話をしたくて。
translation:
No, it's just...it's nothing in particular.
I just wanted to talk with you, Uesugi-kun.

japanese: 話って、それが用なんじゃないのか？
translation: You sure it's nothing more than a chat?

japanese: 話といっても重要なことではなくて、その……。
translation:
Well, even though I say talk, it's not 
exactly anything important...

japanese: （一緒に過ごしたいってことか……！）
translation: (...She wants to spend time with me!)

japanese:
わかった、だったら立ち話はあれだよな。
入ってくれ。
translation:
Alright, but let's at least talk while standing.
Come on in.

japanese: お邪魔します。
translation: Pardon the intrusion.

japanese:
話があるならラウンジに行くか？
その、部屋で２人きりは嫌だろ？
translation:
We could go to the lounge, if you want to talk?
You don't want to be alone with me in my room, right?

japanese:
（付き合ってるとはいえ、
　こんな時間に男と２人ってのはさすがにな）
translation:
(Even though we're dating,
 being alone with me in my room
 at this hour is a bit much.)

japanese:
あの、気遣ってくださるのは嬉しいのですが、
少しお話をしたいだけなので。
あなたがよければ、お部屋で……。
translation:
Well, I'm glad you're considerate,
but I just wanted to talk a little.
If it's okay with you, we can talk in your room...

japanese:
そ、そうか。
じゃあ、入ってくれ。
translation:
I-I see.
Well, come on in then.

japanese: はい、ありがとうございます。
translation: Okay, thank you very much.

japanese: どうぞ入ってくれ。
translation: Come on in.

japanese: あっ……。
translation: Ah...

japanese: ん？　なんだ？
translation: Huh? What is it?

japanese:
い、いえ、その……
突然、不躾なことを言ってしまってすみません。
translation:
W-well, um...
I'm sorry for suddenly saying something so forward.

japanese:
あー……。
確かに、この時間に異性の部屋に来るのは
どうかとは思うぞ？
translation:
Ahhh...
Actually, I guess it is a little much to go
into a guy's room at this hour, huh?

japanese:
けど、俺も……お前と過ごしたいって
思ってるところはあるし。
translation:
But, I...
I also wanna spend time with you.

japanese: そうですか……。
translation: Is that so...

japanese: では、お邪魔します。
translation: Well then, pardon the intrusion.

japanese: おう。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
（まさか、五月から俺の部屋に来るなんて。
　こんな事態はまったく想定してなかった！）
translation:
(I never expected Itsuki to come to my room.
 I didn't anticipate this situation at all!)

japanese:
（部屋に２人きりのこの状況、
　キスをするなら絶好のチャンス――）
translation:
(Although, this situation of being alone in my room with her
 is a perfect opportunity to kiss her%p-2;――%p;)

japanese:
（って、がっつくんじゃない俺！
　まだ旅行は始まったばかりだぞ、
　もっと慎重に事を運ぶんだ！）
translation:
(N-no, I shouldn't be too aggressive!
 The trip has only just begun,
 I need to handle things more carefully!)

japanese:
そういや、俺の部屋に来るってこと
他の奴らには言ってきたのか？
translation:
By the way, did you tell the others
that you were coming to my room?

japanese:
ええ、一花には話してきました。
二乃や三玖が相手でも、ちゃんと話したと思います。
translation:
Yes, I told Ichika about it.
I think it would've gone fine
with Nino and Miku as well.

japanese:
みんなは私たちの交際を認めてくれていますから。
黙っている理由はありませんよね。
translation:
Everyone approves of our relationship,
so there's no reason to keep it a secret, right?

japanese: ……ああ。
translation: ...Right.

japanese:
（俺の告白に五月が返事をくれるまで、
　姉妹でどんなやり取りがあったのかは知らない。
　あいつらも俺に話そうとはしなかった）
translation:
(I actually have no idea what kind of interaction took place 
 between all the sisters until Itsuki responded to 
 my confession. They didn't tell me anything.)

japanese:
（ただ、それぞれが
　納得できる形にはなったのだと思う）
translation:
(However, I think they each came to an agreement
 that they could accept.)

japanese:
（でなければ、こうして
　みんな揃って卒業旅行なんてできないはずだ）
translation:
(Otherwise, we wouldn't have been able
 to go on this graduation trip together.)

japanese:
とはいえ……
交際と言っても、私たちは
特になにが変わったわけでもありませんが。
translation:
Although...
Despite the fact that we're in a relationship,
nothing has actually changed for us.

japanese: ま、まあ、お互い受験で忙しかったからな。
translation: W-well, we were both busy with exams, after all.

japanese:
受験生は勉強第一だ。
恋愛にうつつを抜かして
大学に落ちるなんて許されねぇし。
translation:
And, as students, studying came first. 
We couldn't afford to get distracted from university prep 
just because we're in a relationship.

japanese: そうですね……。
translation: I suppose so...

japanese:
あの、上杉君。
改めて、ありがとうございました。
私が合格できたのはあなたのおかげです。
translation:
Um, Uesugi-kun. Thank you again for everything.
I was able to pass thanks to you.

japanese:
俺は家庭教師として当然の仕事をしただけだ。
お前が頑張った結果だろ。
translation:
I just did my job as a tutor.
You passed because you worked hard.

japanese:
それでも、です。
あなたのおかげで、
自分の夢を追いかけることができるのですから。
translation: Even so. Thanks to you, I can now pursue my dream.

japanese: 進学も決まって、これからは……。
translation:
Now that I've been accepted to university,
from now on...

japanese: ……これからは？
translation: ...From now on?

japanese: これからは……やっぱり……。
translation: From now on... I'm...

japanese: どうした？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese: おい、五月？
translation: Hey, Itsuki?

japanese: あの……もう少しここにいていいですか？
translation: Um... Can I stay here a little longer?

japanese:
はあっ？
答えになってないぞ、なにか言おうとしてただろ？
translation:
Huh?
That doesn't really answer my question.
Was there something you wanted to say?

japanese: ……なんでもありません。
translation: ...It's nothing.

japanese: いや、なんでもなくはなさそうな――
translation: I mean, it doesn't seem like it's nothing%p-2;――

japanese:
言いましたよね？
一緒にいたいと思ってるって。
translation:
You said it, right?
That you want to be with me.

japanese:
私もです。
恋人と……一緒にいたいから……。
translation:
Me too.
I want to be with you...
as your significant other...

japanese: そ、そうか……。
translation: O-oh... Really?

japanese: こ、恋人と……一緒にいたいと思ってはダメですか？
translation: I-is it wrong...to want to be with you?

japanese:
だ……ダメじゃない、と思うぞ。
俺だって五月と一緒にいたい。
translation:
I don't...I don't think it's wrong.
I want to be with you too, Itsuki.

japanese: ……よかった、安心しました。
translation: ...Oh good. I'm relieved.

japanese:
（これはまずい。
　恋人って意識し始めた途端に、
　なにを話していいかわからなくなってきた！）
translation:
(Uh oh.
 As soon as I started thinking of her as my lover,
 I don't know what to say anymore!)

japanese:
きょ、今日はいい天気でしたね。
明日も晴れてくれるといいのですが。
translation:
Th-the weather was nice today, wasn't it?
I hope it stays sunny tomorrow.

japanese:
大丈夫だろ。
天気予報じゃ、しばらくは晴れだったし。
translation:
It should be fine.
The weather forecast said it'll be clear for a while.

japanese: そうですか。
translation: I see.

japanese:
そ、そういや今日の夕飯、
やっぱり海鮮の美味さはさすがだったな！
translation:
S-speaking of which, about today's dinner.
As expected, the seafood was beyond delicious!

japanese:
え、ええ。
お刺身の新鮮さには驚きましたね。
translation:
Y-yes.
I was surprised by how fresh the sashimi was.

japanese:
（……世の恋人たちは
　こういう時、どんな話をするんだ！？
　まったくわからん！！）
translation:
(What do lovers usually talk about
 in moments like this?!
 I have no idea!!)

japanese:
あ……。
そろそろ戻りますね、時間も時間ですので。
translation:
Ah...
It's about time I head back,
isn't it? It's getting late.

japanese:
お、おう。
その、夜道に気をつけてな。
translation:
Y-yeah.
Be careful going back.

japanese:
ホテルの中を歩くだけなので、
危ないことなんてありませんよ。
translation:
I'm just walking around the hotel,
so there's nothing to worry about.

japanese:
そりゃそうだ。
ははは……。
translation:
That's true.
Hahaha...

japanese:
でも、ありがとうございます。
おやすみなさい上杉君。
translation:
But, thanks a lot.
Good night, Uesugi-kun.

japanese: ああ、おやすみ。
translation: Yeah, good night.

japanese: はああぁぁぁぁ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese:
（恋人らしいってなんだ？
　経験したことなんて当然ねぇし
　まったくわからねぇ！）
translation:
(What does it mean to act like a lover?
 I have no experience, so I have no idea!)

japanese: ……まあ、気にしてても仕方ない。
translation: Well...there's no point in worrying about it.

japanese:
（上手くはいかなかったが、五月も俺と
　恋人らしく過ごしたいって思ってくれてることは
　確認できた。これは収穫だ）
translation:
(It didn't go smoothly, but I confirmed that Itsuki
 wants to spend time with me as a lover.
 That's progress.)

japanese:
（まだ旅行は始まったばかり、
　明日からが本番だぜ……！）
translation:
(The trip has just begun.
 Tomorrow is when things really start!)
